sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useCallback } from 'react'; import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import api from '../config/axios'; import toast from 'react-hot-toast'; import { ArrowLeft, Edit, Trash2, Plus, Mail, Phone, Building, MapPin, FileText, User, Zap, Star, Rocket, Globe, Shield, Eye, Clock, CheckCircle, AlertCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const ClientDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [client, setClient] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const fetchClient = useCallback(async () => { try { const response = await api.get(`/clients/${id}`); setClient(response.data.client); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching client:', error); toast.error('Failed to fetch client details'); } finally { setLoading(false); } }, [id]); useEffect(() => { if (id) { fetchClient(); } }, [id, fetchClient]); if (loading) { return (
{/* Enhanced Cosmic Background */}
); } if (!client) { return (
{/* Enhanced Cosmic Background */}

Back to Clients
); } return (
{/* Enhanced Cosmic Background */}
{/* Header - Electric Purple & Neon Pink */}

{client.name}

Client Details

{/* Left Column - Contact Info & Projects */}
{/* Contact Information - Electric Orange & Red */}

)}

)}
{/* Projects - Neon Cyan & Electric Blue */}

)}

))}

)}
{/* Right Sidebar */}
{/* Quick Stats - Electric Green & Lime */}

Active Projects {client.projects ? client.projects.filter(p => p.status === 'In Progress').length : 0}
Completed {client.projects ? client.projects.filter(p => p.status === 'Completed').length : 0}
{/* Quick Actions - Hot Pink & Magenta */}

Quick Actions

); }; export default ClientDetail;
